page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT / LITTLE STOKE
page.content: Employment is varied and includes {Watsons}who make girders, a few shops and services, stables, farms, but {Rolls Royce}is by far the main employer. Rolls Royce employs 9000 and started production in 1920.Annually R.R. takes on 40 engineering apprentices, 20 under graduates and 74 on the Youth Training Scheme. R.R. in Filton specialise in military engines i.e. the Pegasus which goes into the Harrier, the RB 199 (Tornado) and the Viper that powers a lot of light aircraft. Out of 240 pupils who left{Patchway {Comprehensive}61 found full time jobs, 90% of these where in the Bristol area . Most attend Youth Training Scheme where they experience the world of work for one year and get paid a small wage.
